Name: Green Fairy
Ingredients: 20 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A well-balanced Absinthe Sour served straight-up.
History: Created in the 1990s by Dick Bradsell , London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Green Fairy contains 175 calories
